name: ipld-garbage
description: Garbage data generator for the IPLD Data Model

scripts.build: npm_config_yes=true npx ipjs build --tests && cp README.md LICENSE dist/
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage: c8 --reporter=html node node test.js && npx st -d coverage -p 8080

author: Rod <rod@vagg.org> (http://r.va.gg/)
